Features.Name: ReportingExample
Features.Description:
In order to avoid silly mistakes
	As a math idiot
	I want to be able to make various calculations

Scenarios.Name: Add two numbers
Scenarios.Description: In order to check the addition function works

Steps.Name: I have entered 7 into my calculator
I have also entered 10 into my calculator
I press the add key
the displayed result should be 17

Scenarios.Name: Add two numbers
Scenarios.Description: In order to check the addition function works

Steps.Name: I have entered 20 into my calculator
I have also entered 50 into my calculator
I press the add key
the displayed result should be 70

Scenarios.Name: Add two numbers
Scenarios.Description: In order to check the addition function works

Steps.Name: I have entered 56 into my calculator
I have also entered 100 into my calculator
I press the add key
the displayed result should be 156

Scenarios.Name: Divide one number by another number
Scenarios.Description: In order to check the division function works

Steps.Name: I have entered 29388 into my calculator
I have also entered 124 into my calculator
I press the divide key
the displayed result should be 236
